ComicInfo.Summary: College Daze: The Hulk battles the Troyjan robots invading Earth. The Troyjan capture General Ross. Hulk reverts to Bruce Banner and gives himself to the Troyjan invaders. The Silver Surfer approaches the invading Troyjan vessel.
